q_en: What raw materials are used by Skilled Sewers?
gt:
Hello there! ðŸ˜„ Let's dive into the world of raw materials used by the talented "Skilled Sewers" team. Here's a neat table showcasing the materials they work with:

| Material ID |
|-------------|
| 2           |
| 4           |
| 6           |
| 8           |
| 10          |
| 12          |

These are the unique material IDs that the "Skilled Sewers" use in their crafting. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ðŸ§µâœ¨

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group named "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs associated with sewing tasks assigned to "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (8, 17, 18, 19, 23, 27, 28, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs associated with the order_product IDs

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT material_id FROM product_material WHERE product_id IN (2, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 14, 23);
steps.description: Retrieve the material IDs used by the products associated with "Skilled Sewers"
